definition[0]: to put several things, problems etc in order of importance, so that you can deal with the most important ones first
example[0]: You need to prioritize your tasks.
definition[1]: to deal with one thing first, because it is the most important
example[1]: The public wants to see the fight against crime prioritized.
definition[2]: to put several tasks, problems etc in order of importance so that the most important ones are done first
example[2]: We are going to have to prioritize because of the very severe cutbacks in staff.
example[3]: Those cars were critical to Nissanâ€™s image, so they prioritized them in the product cycle.
